SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.messages

Class NewView

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.messages.NewView
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class NewView extends Object implements Serializable
The NewView class represents the updated view of the game state. It contains all information to display to give to the players.
See Also:
